alert.note: Alert for Polk; San Jacinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:53PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central San Jacinto and southwestern Polk Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 352 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Coldspring, or 11 miles west of Livingston, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Livingston, Onalaska, Coldspring, Lake Livingston State Park and West Livingston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
